    "pinned": false,
    "group_category_id": null,
    "can_group": false,
    "locked_for_user": false,
    "message": "Dear ENG101 students,\n\nThis is to announce that the English Foundation final assessment will be held on:\n\n📅 Date: TBD\n⏰ Time: TBD\n⏱️ Duration: 90 minutes\n📍 Location: Language Lab L101\n\nNote: Students with exemption score of 90 or above may be exempt from this assessment.\n\nPlease check with your score of English Entrance Qualification Examination.\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
    "subscription_hold": "topic_is_announcement"
  },

    "url": "http://localhost:10001/courses/38/discussion_topics/202",
    "pinned": false,
    "group_category_id": null,
    "can_group": false,
    "locked_for_user": false,
    "message": "Dear ENG101-3 students,\n\n📅 Midterm Exam Schedule:\n\n📅 Date: November 12, 2024\n⏰ Time: Regular class time\n⏱️ Duration: 75 minutes\n📍 Location: Regular classroom\n\n📚 Exam Coverage:\n- Chapters 1-6 from textbook\n- All lecture materials through Week 8\n- Homework assignments 1-4\n\n📝 Format:\n- Multiple choice (40%)\n- Short answer questions (35%)\n- Problem solving (25%)\n\n💡 Study Tips:\n- Review lecture slides and notes\n- Practice problems from homework\n- Attend review session on November 10\n\nGood luck with your preparation!\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
    "subscription_hold": "topic_is_announcement"
  },
  {
    "id": 201,
    "title": "Essay Assignment 1 - ENG101-3",
    "last_reply_at": "2025-09-15T18:06:11Z",
    "delayed_post_at": null,
    "posted_at": "2025-09-15T18:06:11Z",

    },
    "html_url": "http://localhost:10001/courses/38/discussion_topics/201",
    "url": "http://localhost:10001/courses/38/discussion_topics/201",
    "pinned": false,
    "group_category_id": null,
    "can_group": false,
    "locked_for_user": false,
    "message": "Dear ENG101-3 students,\n\n📝 Your first essay assignment is now available.\n\n📅 Due Date: October 18, 2024, 11:59 PM\n📊 Weight: 20% of final grade\n📄 Length: 1000-1200 words\n\n📋 Assignment Details:\n- Topic: 'The Impact of Technology on Modern Communication'\n- Use MLA format\n- Minimum 5 academic sources required\n- Submit as PDF or Word document\n\n✍️ Requirements:\n- Clear thesis statement\n- Well-structured arguments\n- Proper citations and bibliography\n- Proofread for grammar and style\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
    "subscription_hold": "topic_is_announcement"
  },

    "group_category_id": null,
    "can_group": false,
    "locked_for_user": false,
    "message": "Dear ENG101-3 students,\n\nWelcome to English Foundation-3! I'm excited to have you in this course.\n\n🏫 Course Information:\n🎓 Credits: 1\n📝 Exam Type: Closed Book\n\n📚 Course Materials:\n- Please check the syllabus for required textbooks\n- All lecture slides will be posted on Canvas\n- Office hours: Tuesdays and Thursdays 2:00-4:00 PM\n\n💡 Important Notes:\n- Please introduce yourself in the discussion forum\n- Check your email regularly for course updates\n- Don't hesitate to ask questions!\n\nLooking forward to a great semester!\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
    "subscription_hold": "topic_is_announcement"
  },

    "message": "Dear ENG101-3 students,\n\n📝 Your first essay assignment is now available.\n\n📅 Due Date: October 18, 2024, 11:59 PM\n📊 Weight: 20% of final grade\n📄 Length: 1000-1200 words\n\n📋 Assignment Details:\n- Topic: 'The Impact of Technology on Modern Communication'\n- Use MLA format\n- Minimum 5 academic sources required\n- Submit as PDF or Word document\n\n✍️ Requirements:\n- Clear thesis statement\n- Well-structured arguments\n- Proper citations and bibliography\n- Proofread for grammar and style\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
